alert.note: Alert for Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft; Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 27 at 3:59AM MDT until October 28 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 AM MDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 7 inches with the heaviest falling to the west of I-25 and across the higher terrain south of Trinidad up to Raton Pass. * WHERE...Huerfano and western Las Animas counties including Walsenburg. * WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 6 AM MDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Embedded thunderstorms this afternoon could cause locally intense snowfall rates and rapidly deteriorating travel conditions along highway 160 and I-25 towards Raton Pass.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft; Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft
